# 1. Set Up

```{r load_pkgs}
pkgs <- c('tidyverse',
          'rgdal',
          'devtools',
          'tigris',
          'leaflet',
          'sp',
          'ggmap',
          'maptools',
          'broom',
          'httr',
          'reticulate',
          'glue',
          'lubridate')

sapply(pkgs, require, character.only = TRUE)
```

```{r devtools_load_all}
devtools::load_all()
```

# 2. Get Reddit Scraping Data

```{r get_reddit_scraped_data}
# Please paste this to Console instead
df_reddit <- get_reddit_data()
```

# 3. Get Facebook Scraping Data

```{r get_facebook_scraped_data}
# Please paste this to Console instead
df_facebook <- get_facebook_data()
```
